item.title: Install R and RStudio (Posit)
item.description: You must install R and RStudio on your PCs before attending the workshop. Download and Install R and RStudio In this workshop, we will be using the free and open-source program R, along with a user interface called RStudio. R works on pretty much every platform available, including the widely available Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux systems. Step 1: Download software Follow the url below and download R and R studio.
